main_display: Interactive SVG showing Earth as a 120px circle with visible axis line, rotating around a stationary Sun. Day/night shown with half-circle shading that rotates with Earth. Seasons indicated by colored hemispheres (red for summer, blue for winter)
animation_style: smooth continuous rotation with 300ms easing for state changes
visual_metaphor: Earth as a spinning top that also walks in a circle around a lamp (Sun)
